output_list.criticism: The mintlvlToken function does not check the balance of the user issuing the token, allowing the creator of the token to set the balance of the user arbitrarily.
The freezelvlAccount function does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to freeze the balance of an arbitrary user.
The setlvSigned function does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the setlvSigned function.
The setlvNominalValue function does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the setlvNominalValue function.
The setlvWebsite function does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the setlvWebsite function.
The setlvNfee function does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the setlvNfee function.
The repayLoan function does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the repayLoan function.
The transferFrom function does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the transferFrom function.
The burnlvlToken function does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to change the balance of the burnlvlToken function.
